name: WPBatch Gallery Slideshow
author: MTM Sujan

sections.description:
This Plugin is developed for them who are looking for something new and exclusive.. hopefully you will like it..

Don’t wait.. install it and check how it works and how it looks
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpbatch-gallery-slideshow.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You will see a new menu in the dashboard “WPBatch Gallery”… add some images from there
  4. now just add this shortcode anywhere in the page, post or widgets 
[wpbatch-gallery]

or Place <?php do_shortcode('[wpbatch-gallery]'); ?> in your templates php files

Good Luck
sections.faq:
is it so tough to install and setup?

No, absolutely not
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • initial first version of the plugin release
